title: "Couldn't finish restoring the backup" - Can't restore Pixel backup from GSuite Google Drive
content:
I'm the GSuite Admin of my organisation and I recently backed my Pixel 4 XL up to my Google Drive.
After a factory reset I've attempted to restore the backup but get the pop-up "Couldn't finish restoring the backup" and then no additional information.

This is incredibly frustrating as it just fails then acts like nothing happened. I have 3+ years worth of backed up texts in a 3mb backup file that I desperately need and I have no way to access them.

The problem lies between GSuite and Pixel. I've spoken to 6+ Support people and none of them could help me.

HOW DO I RESTORE MY TEXT MESSAGES FROM MY GSUITE GOOGLE DRIVE?!
